name: Few things about a shovel
description:
Some words about a shovel:

WASD - Movement
LShift - Sprint
Space - Jump
Shift + Space = Epic jump
E - Interact
RMB - Grab
LMB - Attack
Space + LMB - Dash in looking direction
RMB + LMB - Throw

Attack your enemies to level up. Is it 100% matching theme?

Used asset: Crows and boss skeletons
Other is ours
